mapper.select: select a.no, b.name writer, a.title, a.create_date, a.hits from board a inner join member b on a.writer = b.id order by a.create_date desc
select a.no, b.name writer, a.title, a.content, a.create_date, a.modify_date, a.hits from board a inner join member b on a.writer = b.id where no = ?
mapper.insert: insert into board (writer, title, content) values (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, modify_date = sysdate where no = #{no}
